dataList.name: Bloodflame Sword
dataList.desc:
First Turn Start of an Encounter: Identities with Base Attack Skills that gain [Combustion] gain 5 [Combustion] and heal 8 SP

For Heishou Pack - You Branch Identities: HP gets capped to 49% of Max HP. In return, take 50% less damage and receive 50% reduced heal

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain [Combustion], Offense Levels, and heal SP
HP gets capped. Take less damage and heal less HP.

dataList.name: Blackiron Barding
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: apply (Defense Level / 3) Shield to 1 ally with the highest Defense Level (prioritizes Heishou - Wu Identities; max Shield 15)

When allies with Shield win a Clash, inflict (Speed / 2) [Vibration] Potency; then, gain 2 [Agility] and 2 [DefenseUp] next turn (once per turn per Identity)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict Tremor Potency based on Speed; gain Defense Level next turn

dataList.name: Red Cloth that Closes the Heart
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #1 Deployed Identity]

When other allies use an Unopposed Attack to hit an enemy, gain 1 [AttackUp] next turn (they can activate this only once per turn per Identity; effect itself activates up to 6 times per turn)

When other allies [RetreatForCommon], gain 1 [SlashResultUp] and 1 [SlashDamageUp] next turn (once per turn)

When all above conditions are met, gain 1 [ResultEnhancement] next turn (once per turn)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain Slash Power Up and Slash DMG Up next turn

dataList.name: Virtue - Zhi (智)
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #6 Deployed Identity]

When using an Attack Skill(including E.G.O Skills) that inflicts [Burst] Potency or [Burst] Count to win a clash, gain 2 [DefenseUp] next turn (once per turn)
- If this unit is a Family Hierarch Candidate: also gain 1 [Agility] next turn

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain Defense Level Up. Family Hierarch Candidate Faction gains [Agility] next turn as well

dataList.name: Virtue - Yong (勇)
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #6 Deployed Identity]

When using an Attack Skill(including E.G.O Skills) that inflicts [Burst] Potency or [Burst] Count to win a clash, gain 2 [AttackUp] next turn (once per turn)
- If this unit is a Family Hierarch Candidate: also gain 3 [AttackUp] next turn

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain Offense Level Up. Family Hierarch Candidate Faction gains [AttackUp] next turn as well

dataList.name: Virtue - Ren (仁)
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #6 Deployed Identity]

When using an Attack Skill(including E.G.O Skills) that inflicts [Burst] Potency or [Burst] Count to win a clash, heal 15 HP (once per turn)
- If this unit is a Family Hierarch Candidate: also gain 1 [Protection] next turn

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Heal HP. Family Hierarch Candidate Faction gains [Protection] next turn as well

dataList.name: Cultivation: Cut, File, Carve, Polish
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #6 Deployed Identity]

When using an Attack Skill(including E.G.O Skills) that inflicts [Burst] Potency or [Burst] Count to win a clash, heal 20 HP, gain 3 [AttackUp], and gain 3 [DefenseUp] next turn (once per turn)
- If this unit is a Family Hierarch Candidate: apply 1 [Agility], 1 [Protection], and 3 [AttackUp] to all allies, including this unit

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain Offense Level Up, Defense Level Up, and heal HP. If this unit is a Family Hierarch Candidate, apply Haste, Protection, and Offense Level Up to all allies next turn as well

dataList.name: Shaoxing Wine
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #2 Deployed Identity]

Deal +1% damage for every 1% missing HP on self (max 10%)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal more damage based on missing HP
